title: RAK12028 WisBlock T-Beam-Fork Connector Module > RAK12028 WisBlock T-Beam-Fork Connector Module > Product Description > RAK12028 Through-Beam-Fork Connector Module Overview
content: RAK12028 is a Through-Beam-Fork (TBF) connector module. It has one (1) standard WisBlock sensor connector, which you can connect with the WisBlock Base. It also has one (1) 6-pins connector dedicated to the RAK12031. The [RAK12031](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock/rak12031/overview/) is a separate Through-Beam-Fork sensor that can be connected to the RAK12028 connector module using a cable.
parent_content: RAK12028 is a Through-Beam-Fork (TBF) connector module. It has one (1) standard WisBlock sensor connector, which you can connect with the WisBlock Base. It also has one (1) 6-pins connector dedicated to the RAK12031. The [RAK12031](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock/rak12031/overview/) is a separate Through-Beam-Fork sensor that can be connected to the RAK12028 connector module using a cable.

title: RAK12028 WisBlock T-Beam-Fork Connector Module > RAK12028 WisBlock T-Beam-Fork Connector Module > Prerequisites > Setting Up RAK12028 with RAK12031 and WisBlock Components
content:
To use a **RAK12028**, you need to connect at least one **RAK12031** Through-Beam-Fork Sensor and also a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides the power supply to the **RAK12028** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the connector and sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:

Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the connector and sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
